home_aboutMe: Graduated in Computer Engineering at Universitat Oberta de Catalunya. Very motivated to learn and grow in my profession.
aboutMe_text1:
I'm Marc Boakye, Full Stack Developer since I studied and . I did a 3x2, that means that in three years I obtained both degrees.
At the present, I'm working as Junior Software Developer at knowmad mood.

I completed my degree in Computer Engineering in June 2025 at (Software Engineering branch) and I got an 8.8 on my Bachelor's Thesis.

aboutPage_text1: This page is built with Vite and React (JS). I also used HTML and CSS.
aboutPage_text2: For the design I used the Material Design (<1>MUI in React) components, and I also took ideas from the following portfolios:
aboutPage_text3: I have been able to develop all the ideas that I had.
aboutPage_text4: In this repository you will find the portfolio's source code:
aboutPage_text5: I really wanted to use React, I knew this framework because it is one of the most popular in Frontend, but I never used it. For this reason, I watched a <1>Udemy course</1> (it's in Spanish) that helped me to understand the basics of this framework.
aboutPage_text6: On the other hand, I used Vite to reduce wait times while developing, since you can see the changes after saving. Furthermore, using the host option helped me to test the website on different devices.
